General.Name: Shiny Chemical Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Shiny Chemical Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and trades in chemical solvents in Taiwan. The company provides electronic solvents that include menthyl acetates, ether alcohol esters, other solvents, and customized products; and industrial solvents comprising of menthyl acetates, ether ester products, and other solvents. It also offers formalin and urea glue; and leases storage tanks and warehouses. It provides electronic solvent for semiconductor and flat screen monitor; and bumping and packaging, and LED industries, as well as encapsulation, testing, and manufacturing of emission diode and photoresist. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.5, Yeong Gong 1st Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 82841
